title: How do I play songs in the background, quit Music, and view the lyrics when a song is playing?
answer:
To play songs in background, touch Music, play any audio file, and touch the back or home key. 

 To exit music, on the music playing screen, touch the menu key and touch Exit > OK. 

 To view lyrics, swipe left on the music playing screen. If an audio file and its lyrics are stored in the same folder, the lyrics are automatically loaded when you play the song.
